title: Ep. 119 - Rick Rule Unplugged: Pt II
itunes:title: Rick Rule Unplugged: Pt II
description: Rick Rule, founder of Global Resources, is one of the most successful resource investors in the world. In this interview, he talks about natural gas as a transportation fuel for cars. Rick gives us his top five places in the world to find the best junior mining companies.
content:encoded: Rick Rule, founder of Global Resources, is one of the most successful resource investors in the world. In this interview, he talks about natural gas as a transportation fuel for cars. Rick gives us his top five places in the world to find the best junior mining companies.
